MS: Which of the following are advantages of flip flops over latches?             Select all that apply.
column3: NOT HTML
FFs do not pass glitches from input to output
FFs are less likely to produce undefined/unknown output
FFs can continuously pass data from input to output whenever they are enabled
FFs can be set and reset with different control signals
FFs are more compact and require less gates
